column1: Highlights: 16 GPON Ports: Supports 1:128 splitting ratio for every port—up to 2048 ONTs by one device.
High-Speed Uplink Ports: 4× 10G SFP+ ports and 2× gigabit uplink ports offer high-bandwidth connectivity.
Dual Power Supplies: Carrier-class reliability with dual hot-swappable power supplies: AC

column3: and more meet the requirement for different applications.

column1: Centralized Management: Supports the management via the DeltaStream PON Management System (DPMS)
